about_the_game:
BLITS TIMES TABLES⚡️

Solve multiplication problems, over and over and over again!!
"BLITS TIMES TABLES" is a game-based math drill.

🎮 Game Overview

"BLITS TIMES TABLES" is a simple yet addictive game where you just keep solving multiplication problems endlessly. Ideal for adults as brain training and perfect for children to master multiplication! Improve your multiplication skills while having fun📈.

🙎 Dear Guardians,

Can you quickly calculate which is more expensive: "20% off $18" or "$15"? To ensure your child can make accurate value judgments and avoid being deceived in the future, strong multiplication and calculation skills are essential. Train your child's calculation abilities in a fun way with this game and help them develop skills that are useful in everyday life! Enjoy quality time playing together with your child, learning while having fun.

Game Modes

9 × 9 Mode
This is the basic mode to master the 9 × 9 multiplication table. Increase your accuracy step by step, and earn approval from all the masters!💯

Extra Mode🔥
A super high-difficulty mode where you challenge beyond the limits of 9 × 9 with 99 × 99! Even the developers can't clear this level!😱 Practice in Practice Mode before taking on the challenge.

Practice Mode🎯 Random problems are presented within the specified range. Focus on practicing your weak areas or aim for high scores in your strong areas!🏆

[g-Edu (Gaming Education)]
Learn while gaming!
